amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection Of Persons And Property
amendatorysection.para: If a financial institution is required or permitted to make payment pursuant to sections 30-2716 to 30-2733 to a minor designated as a beneficiary, payment may be made pursuant to the Nebraska Uniform Transfers to Minors Act or pursuant to any other laws of this state.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Uniform Transfers to Minors Act, see section 43-2701.
